text:
Hello, I have a custom module built using JS and am having some issues with ease of scrolling with mouse and trackpad. Does anyone know if it's possible to achieve the attached level of control within HubSpot? Currently you have to scroll with one finger against the trackpad and one scrolling. Then on mouse, it's very slow/glitchy.

Here is the page URL (<https://learn.matterandspace.com/application-clone>). The fixed section starts with the image on the left that says "The future of work is here - are you ready?"
